name: "But Most Importantly, I Will Always Be Your Knight"
name_original: "But Most Importantly, I Will Always Be Your Knight"
description:
Let me tell you a story. A story of when I was much younger.

***

"But Most Importantly, I Will Always Be Your Knight" is a short visual novel/RPG about a boy and his "knight", and a brave knightess on a quest to rescue the prince.

***

Controls:
Arrow Keys - Move
Z, Enter - Confirm, Interact
X, Esc - Cancel, Open Menu

***

* This story is a work of fiction. I wish it was based on a real story, but more often than not, reality is not as sweet as fiction, you know?
